name: Octopus in a Sea of Blood
name_original: Octopus in a Sea of Blood
description:
~~~ WORK IN PROGRESS ~~~
BUILD 3

YOU ARE AN OCTOPUS IN A SEA OF BLOOD. AVOID THE HEARTS! NOOO!!!! DON'T SWIM INTO THEM WHATDIDITELLYOU!

SUBMISSION FOR A GAME BY ITS COVER 2016
BASED ON THE FAMICOVER BY THE DELICIOUS Igor Jankowski

MAIN THEME MUSIC BY THE TOOTHSOME @visagermusic

GAMEPLAY MUSIC BY THE LOVELY @RoccoWNL
